name: Pew Pew
description:
What is this game?

This is a simple, and easy to play space shooter (that isn't in space) by Hayden Blomfield. It features only one enemy type, only one powerup and nothing much else.

Its pretty basic, but a start.

Who is responsible for this garbage.

That would be me

Artwork: Hayden Blomfield

Design: Hayden Blomfield

Programming: Hayden Blomfield

Testing: Hayden Blomfield

Music: Cyborg Ninja, Kevin Mcleod (http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1600008&Search=Se...)

Total timespan to create:

3 weeks - full work

2 weeks - forgot about it
